name: test-runner-pro
description: Advanced test runner with parallel execution, coverage reports, and interactive debugging for modern JavaScript and TypeScript projects.

installation.summary: Install globally via npm or as a project dependency, configure test patterns, and run tests from the command palette.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

### Global Installation

```bash
npm install -g @opencode/test-runner-pro
```

### Project Installation

```bash
npm install --save-dev @opencode/test-runner-pro
```

### OpenCode Configuration

Add to your `opencode.config.json`:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["test-runner-pro"],
  "testRunner": {
    "testMatch": ["**/*.test.js", "**/*.spec.ts"],
    "coverage": true,
    "parallel": true,
    "maxWorkers": 4
  }
}
```

### Verify Installation

Open OpenCode command palette (Ctrl+Shift+P) and type "Test Runner" to see available commands.
